SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
! Normalize file path :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Server Directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DDL file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Log file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DB User" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DB Password" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "ODBC Data Source" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL file path" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Encoding" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENCODING#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_TABLES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Drop Obsolete Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_TABLES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Drop Obsolete Columns" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_COLUMNS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Dont Rebuild Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DONT_REBUILD#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Import Indexes" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_INDEXES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parallel Index Create" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PAR_INDEX_CREATE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Only Drop Obsolete Indexes" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_INDEXES#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Tablespace" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLESPACE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Stop On DDL Error" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_STOP_ON_ERR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Merge With Existing Schema" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MERGE_SCHEMA#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Additive Schema Change Only" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ADD_CHANGE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository Module Filename" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPO_FILE_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Grantee For Tables" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GRANTEE#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script directory" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Siebel Environment Script file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:SET &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR#/&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT#" errors=0
! Validate siebel environment script :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Environment Script file]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH# is not a valid file" errors=1 fi
! Check if Siebel directory exists :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS "&UC4RB_CHECKME#" = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#" if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then echo "ERROR[Siebel Server Directory]: &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT# is not a valid directory" errors=2 fi
if [ "$errors" -gt "0" ] ; then exit $errors fi
! Begin my code
:SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = "N" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_TABLES# EQ "Yes"
: SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = "Y"
: IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_TABLES# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_TABLES#, "4") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_COLUMNS# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_TABLES#, "5") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DONT_REBUILD# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_TABLES# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_TABLES#, "6") : ENDIF
:ENDIF
:SET &IMPORT_INDEXS# = "N" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_IMPORT_INDEXES# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_INDEXS# = "Y" : IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_PAR_INDEX_CREATE# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_INDEXS# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_INDEXS#, "1") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_DROP_OBS_INDEXES# EQ "Yes" : SET &IMPORT_INDEXS# = STR_CAT(&IMPORT_INDEXS#, "2") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &STOP_ON_ERR# = "N" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_STOP_ON_ERR# EQ "Yes" : SET &STOP_ON_ERR# = "Y" :ENDIF
:SET &MERGE_SCHEMA# = "N" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_MERGE_SCHEMA# EQ "Yes" : SET &MERGE_SCHEMA# = "Y" :ENDIF
:SET &ADD_CHANGE# = "N" :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_ADD_CHANGE# EQ "Yes" : SET &ADD_CHANGE# = "Y" :ENDIF
:SET &CMD# = './ddlimp2 /U "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_USER#" /P "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" /C "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DATA_SOURCE#" /F "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DDL_FILE_PATH#" /E &STOP_ON_ERR# /M &MERGE_SCHEMA# /A &ADD_CHANGE# ' :SET &CMD# = STR_CAT(&CMD#, ' /T &IMPORT_TABLES# /I &IMPORT_INDEXS#')
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPO_FILE_NAME# NE "" : SET &CMD# = STR_CAT(&CMD#, ' /R "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_REPO_FILE_NAME#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_GRANTEE# NE "" : SET &CMD# = STR_CAT(&CMD#, ' /G "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_GRANTEE#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLESPACE# NE "" : SET &CMD# = STR_CAT(&CMD#, ' /S "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_TABLESPACE#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH# NE "" : SET &CMD# = STR_CAT(&CMD#, ' /Q "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH#"') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH# NE "" : SET &CMD# = STR_CAT(&CMD#, ' /L "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#"') :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
! Create log file dir if it doesn't exist :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH" :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_LOG_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
! Create SQL file dir if it doesn't exist :IF &UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SQL_FILE_PATH#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX :ENDIF
. "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_PATH#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
cd "&UC4RB_SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT#/bin" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_SIEBEL_DB_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD &CMD# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script> ! End my code
